q: spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Martin Luther King on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . Nixon promised to endorse Donald Rumsfeld in the primaries if necessary, and also took a shot at the man Donald Rumsfeld would most likely be running to defeat: The Gerald Ford told me that he will endorse and support me. He said he couldn't before, but he will now even in primaries if it will help me. He said he felt I should decide now, and not tell anybody except for a few people. If I told any more it would be stupid, and I'm not stupid. He went on to say that Adlai Stevenson III was light. He was better looking than his dad, but he had no elan, that he could be beat, and that he, the Gerald Ford , wanted to do what he could to help me
